titleStmt.title: Maschil vnmasked In a treatise defending this sentence of our Church: vidz. the present Romish Church hath not the nature of the true Church. Against the publick opposition of Mr. Cholmley, and Mr. Butterfield, two children revolted in opinion from their owne subscription, and the faith of their mother the Church of England. By Thomas Spencer.
titleStmt.author: Spencer, Thomas, fl. 1628-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-streete,

notesStmt.note: A reply to "The state of the now-Romane Church" by Hugh Cholmley and "Maschil" by Robert Butterfield.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
